DOC.brief_summary: This project will create a community based exercise program for well cancer survivors. The goal is that the YMCA will gain the competence to work with this unique population in a safe and productive manner.
DOC.brief_title: Community Based Exercise Program for Well Cancer Survivors
DOC.detailed_description: All well, adult, cancer survivors are eligible to participate.
DOC.criteria: All well cancer survivors who are medically stable. Children are not eligible for this project.
